pageContent: Objective: To determine whether time from diagnosis to treatment impacted outcomes in a multicentre cohort of high- and very-high-risk (VHR) patients with prostate cancer undergoing radical prostatectomy (RP).

metaData.source:
Radical prostatectomy in high-risk and locally advanced prostate cancer: Mayo Clinic perspective
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25459359/
